name: Daryabadi
text: By the angels ranged in ranks.

name: Daryabadi
text: By the angels driving away.

name: Daryabadi
text: By the angels reciting the praise.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily your God is One.

name: Daryabadi
text: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatsoever is in- between the twain, and Lord of the easts.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily We! We have adorned the nearest heaven with an adornment: the stars.

name: Daryabadi
text: And have placed therein a guard against any Satan froward.

name: Daryabadi
text: They cannot listen to the exalted assembly, and they are darted at from every side.

name: Daryabadi
text: With a driving fusillade, and theirs shall be a torment perpetual;

name: Daryabadi
text: Except him who snatcheth away a word by stealth, and him then pursueth a glowing flame.

name: Daryabadi
text: Ask them thou: are they stronger in structure or those others whom We have created? Verily We! We have created them of a sticky clay.

name: Daryabadi
text: Aye! thou marvellest, and they scoff.

name: Daryabadi
text: And when they are admonished, they receive not admcnition.

name: Daryabadi
text: And when they behold a sign, they turn to scoffing.

name: Daryabadi
text: And they say: this Qur'an is naught but magic manifest.

name: Daryabadi
text: When we have become dead and have become dust and bones, shall we then verily be raised?

name: Daryabadi
text: And also our forefathers?

name: Daryabadi
text: Say thou: and verily ye; shall then be despicable.

name: Daryabadi
text: It shall be but one shout, lo! they shall be staring.

name: Daryabadi
text: And they will say: Ah! woe be Unto us! this is the Day of Requital.

name: Daryabadi
text: This is the Day of Judgment which ye were wont to belie.

name: Daryabadi
text: Gather together those who did wrong and their comrades and that which they were wont to worship

name: Daryabadi
text: Beside Allah, and lead them on to the path of the Flaming Fire.

name: Daryabadi
text: And stop them; verily they are to be questioned:

name: Daryabadi
text: What aileth you that ye succour not one another?

name: Daryabadi
text: Nay! on that Day they will be entirely submissive.

name: Daryabadi
text: And they will advance toward each other mutually questioning.

name: Daryabadi
text: They will say: verily ye! ye were wont to come Unto us Imposing.

name: Daryabadi
text: They will say: nay! ye yourselves were not believers.

name: Daryabadi
text: And we had over you no authority, but ye were a people exorbitant.

name: Daryabadi
text: So on us hath been justified the sentence of our Lord: verily we are to taste.

name: Daryabadi
text: We seduced you astray; verily we were ourselves the seduced ones.

name: Daryabadi
text: So verily on that Day they all in the torment will be sharers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily We! in this wise We deal with the culprits.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily when it was said Unto them: there is no god but Allah, they ever grew stiff-necked.

name: Daryabadi
text: And they said: are we going to abandon our gods on account of a Poet distracted?

name: Daryabadi
text: Aye! he hath come with the truth, and he confesseth to the sent ones.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily ye are going to taste a torment afflictive.

name: Daryabadi
text: And ye shall be required not except for that which ye have been doing;

name: Daryabadi
text: But the bondmen of Allah, the sincere ones -

name: Daryabadi
text: Those! theirs shall be a provision known:

name: Daryabadi
text: Fruits! And they shall be honoured.

name: Daryabadi
text: In Gardens of Delight.

name: Daryabadi
text: On couches, facing one another.

name: Daryabadi
text: Round shall be passed a cup Unto them filled with limpid drink:

name: Daryabadi
text: White, a pleasure Unto the drinkers.

name: Daryabadi
text: No headiness there shall be therein, nor shall they be therewith Inebriated.

name: Daryabadi
text: And with them shall be damsels of refraining looks, large- eyed

name: Daryabadi
text: As though they were eggs hidden.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then they will advance Unto each other, mutually questioning.

name: Daryabadi
text: And a speaker from among them will say: verily there was Unto me a mate.

name: Daryabadi
text: Who said: art thou of those who confess to the doctrine of Resurrection:

name: Daryabadi
text: When we are dead and have become dust and bones, are we indeed going to be requited?

name: Daryabadi
text: Allah will say: will ye look down?

name: Daryabadi
text: Then he will look down and see him in the midst of the Flaming Fire.

name: Daryabadi
text: And he will say: by Allah, thou hadst wellnigh causedest me to perish.

name: Daryabadi
text: And but for the favourcf my lord, I should have been of those brought forward.

name: Daryabadi
text: Are we not then to die

name: Daryabadi
text: Save our first death, and are we not to be tormented?

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily this! that is the supreme achievement.

name: Daryabadi
text: For the like of this, then, let the workers work.

name: Daryabadi
text: Is this better as an entertainment or the tree of Zaqqum?

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily We! We have made it a temptation for the wrong- doers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily it is a tree that springeth forth in the bottom of Flaming Fire.

name: Daryabadi
text: The fruit thereof is as though the hoods of the serpents.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily they must eat thereof and fill their bellies therewith.

name: Daryabadi
text: And thereafter verily they shall have thereon a draught of balling water.

name: Daryabadi
text: And thereafter verily their return is Unto the Flaming Fire.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily they found their fathers gone astray.

name: Daryabadi
text: So they in their footsteps are rushing.

name: Daryabadi
text: And assuredly there went stray before them many of the ancients.

name: Daryabadi
text: And assuredly We sent among them warners.

name: Daryabadi
text: So behold what wise hath been the end of those who were warned.

name: Daryabadi
text: Save the bondmen of Allah sincere.

name: Daryabadi
text: And assuredly Nuh cried Unto us; and We are the Best of answerers!

name: Daryabadi
text: And We delivered him and his people from the great affliction.

name: Daryabadi
text: And his offspring! them We made the survivors.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We left for him among the posterity.

name: Daryabadi
text: Peace be on Nuh among the worlds.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily We! thus We recompense the well-doers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily he was of Our bondmen believing.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then We drowned the others.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily of his sect was Ibrahim.

name: Daryabadi
text: Recall what time he came Unto his lord with a heart whole.

name: Daryabadi
text: Recall what time he said Unto his father and his people: What is it that ye worship?

name: Daryabadi
text: Is it a falsehood-god beside Allah - that ye desire?

name: Daryabadi
text: what, then, is your opinion of the Lord of the worlds?

name: Daryabadi
text: Then he glanced a glance on the stars.

name: Daryabadi
text: And he said: verily I am about to be sick.

name: Daryabadi
text: So they departed from him turning their backs.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then he slipped Unto their gods and said: eat ye not

name: Daryabadi
text: What aileth ye that ye speak not?

name: Daryabadi
text: Then he slipped Unto them striking them with the right hand.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then they advanced toward him, hastening.

name: Daryabadi
text: He said: worship ye that which carve.

name: Daryabadi
text: Whereas Allah hath created you and that which ye make?

name: Daryabadi
text: They said. build for him a building and cast him into the flaming fire.

name: Daryabadi
text: And they devised a plot for him, but We made them the humble.

name: Daryabadi
text: And he said: verily I am going to my Lord who will guide me.

name: Daryabadi
text: My Lord! Bestow on me a son who will be of the righteous.

name: Daryabadi
text: Wherefore We gave him the glad tidings of a boy gentle.

name: Daryabadi
text: And when he attained the age of, running with him, he said: O my son! verily I have seen in a dream that I am slaughtering thee; so look, what considerest thou? He said: O my father! do that which thou art commanded; thou shalt find me, Allah willing, of the patients.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then when the twain had submitted themselves and he had prostrated him upon his temple.

name: Daryabadi
text: We cried Unto him: O Ibrahim

name: Daryabadi
text: Of a surety thou hast fulfilled the vision. Verily We! thus We recompense the well-doers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily that! that was a trial manifest.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We ransomed him with a mighty victim.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We left for him among the posterity:

name: Daryabadi
text: Peace be Unto Ibrahim:

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily We! thus We compense the well-doers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily he was one of Our believing bondmen.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We gave him the glad tidings of Is-haq, a prophet, and of the righteous.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We blessed him and Is-haq; and of their offspring are some well-doers and some who wrong themselves manifestly.

name: Daryabadi
text: And assuredly We gave grace Unto Musa and Harun.

name: Daryabadi
text: And delivered them and their people from the great affliction.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We succoured them so that they became overcomers.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We vouchsafed Unto the twain a Book luminous.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We led the twain on Unto the straight path.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We left for the twain among the posterity:

name: Daryabadi
text: Peace be Unto Musa and Harun.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily We! thus We recompense the well-doers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily the twain were of Our bondmen believing.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily, llyas was one of the sent ones.

name: Daryabadi
text: Recall what time he said Unto his people: fear ye not?

name: Daryabadi
text: Call ye upon Bal and forsake the Best of creators.

name: Daryabadi
text: Allah, your Lord and Lord of your forefathers?

name: Daryabadi
text: Then they belied him, so verily they are to be brought up.

name: Daryabadi
text: Except the bondmen of Allah sincere.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We left for him among the posterity:

name: Daryabadi
text: Peace be Unto Elyasin.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily We! thus We recompense the well-doers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily he was one of Our bondmen believing.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily Lut was of the sent ones.

name: Daryabadi
text: Recall what time We delivered him and his household, all.

name: Daryabadi
text: Save an old woman among the lingerers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then We annihilated the others.

name: Daryabadi
text: And surely ye pass by them in the morning.

name: Daryabadi
text: And at night. Will ye not therefore reflect?

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily Yunus was Of the sent ones.

name: Daryabadi
text: Recall what time he ran away Unto a laden ship.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then he joined the lots, and was of the condemned.

name: Daryabadi
text: And a fish swallowed him, and he was reproaching himself.

name: Daryabadi
text: And had he not been of those who hallow Him,

name: Daryabadi
text: He would have tarried in the belly thereof till the Day when they are raised.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then We cast him on a bare desert whilst he was sick.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We caused to grow over him a tree, a gourd.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We had sent him to a hundred thousand: rather they exceeded.

name: Daryabadi
text: And they believed, whrefore We let them enjoy life for a season.

name: Daryabadi
text: Now ask thou them: there for thy Lord daughters and for them sons?

name: Daryabadi
text: Or created We the angels females while they were witnesses?

name: Daryabadi
text: Lo! verily it is of their falsehood that they say:

name: Daryabadi
text: God hath begotten. Verily they are the liars.

name: Daryabadi
text: Hath He chosen daughters above sons?

name: Daryabadi
text: What aileth you? How judge ye?

name: Daryabadi
text: Will ye not then be admonished?

name: Daryabadi
text: Or, is there for you a clear warranty

name: Daryabadi
text: Then bring your book, if ye say sooth.

name: Daryabadi
text: And they have made a kinship between Him and the jinn a kinship whereas the jinn assuredly know that they are to be brought up

name: Daryabadi
text: Hallowed be Allah from that which they ascribe to Him.

name: Daryabadi
text: Except the bondmen of Allah sincere.

name: Daryabadi
text: Wherefore verily neither ye nor that which ye worship,

name: Daryabadi
text: Can tempt anyone to rebel against Him.

name: Daryabadi
text: Save him Who is to roast in the Flaming Fire.

name: Daryabadi
text: Of us there is none but hath a station assigned.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily we! we are ranged in ranks.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily we! we halloW.

name: Daryabadi
text: And they surely were wont to say:

name: Daryabadi
text: Had we but an admonition as had the ancients.

name: Daryabadi
text: Surefy we would have been the bondmen of God sincere.

name: Daryabadi
text: Yet they disbelieve therein. Presently they shall come to know.

name: Daryabadi
text: And assuredly Our word hath already gone forth Our bondmen, the sent ones:

name: Daryabadi
text: That verily they! they shall be made triumphant.

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily Our host! they are to be overcome.

name: Daryabadi
text: So turn thou aside from them for a season.

name: Daryabadi
text: And see them thou; they themselves shall presently see.

name: Daryabadi
text: Our torment seek they to hasten on!

name: Daryabadi
text: Then when it descendeth Unto them face to, face, a hapless morn that shall be for those who were Warned.

name: Daryabadi
text: And turn thou aside from them for a season.

name: Daryabadi
text: And see thou: they themselves shall presently see.

name: Daryabadi
text: Hallowed be thine Lord, the Lord of Majesty, from that which they ascribe!

name: Daryabadi
text: And peace be Unto the sent ones.

name: Daryabadi
text: And all praise Unto Allah the Lord of the worlds.
